name: DestinyHolocron
0:
”Alexa, open Destiny Holocron.”
”How do I setup a match?”
”What is card number twenty in the Spirit of Rebellion set?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: destiny holocron
des:
The Destiny Holocron assists players by providing rules, instructions and answers to frequently asked questions to keep the game running smoothly. This skill can provide answers to questions that may seem unclear in the rulebook and provide directions for game setup.

Have the skill assist with game setup:
 • How do I start a game of Destiny?
 • Explain the Determine the Battlefield step of setup.

Keep the game playing smooth by asking questions while playing:
 • What does the Ambush keyword do?
 • What does it mean to spot a red character?

Get details of the card sets:
 • How many cards are in the Across the Galaxy expansion set?
 • What is card twenty in the Spirit of Rebellion expansion set?

This is an unofficial skill, and is not associated with Fantasy Flight Games, Lucasmfilm Ltd. or Disney.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
